notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: The authors declare no conflict of interest, particularly, no recommendations regarding priority development of drugs or preferred use are made, except in the context of regulatory approval.

notes.title: Research involving human and animal rights
notes.p: In this review article, research involving human participants and/or animals is reported and cited.

notes.title: Informed consent
notes.p: Informed consent was required as per instructions to authors of the respective publishing journals.
